name: Colero's Quest
description:
Colero's Quest is a game with 4 different levels in which you play as a Bishop helping your fellow hero defeat the island's biggest menaces.

Shield him from elemental attacks;

Help him attack their foes;

And most importantly... Heal his wounds by sacrificing your own health!

We are an aspiring small studio aiming to improve on our skills regarding game development and create better games for your entertainment! This game is our entry to the 2022's My First Game Jam, which theme was "healer". We hope you like it!
